todos.title: Finish Angular task
todos.description: Complete the dynamic form validation logic by handling conditional validators, cross-field dependencies, async validation for backend checks, proper error message mapping, and ensuring that validation states persist correctly when navigating between steps or reloading cached form data.

todos.title: Review PRs
todos.description: Check all pending pull requests on GitHub including code style consistency, architectural correctness, edge-case handling, performance implications, test coverage adequacy, backward compatibility, and ensure that all CI checks are passing before approval or requesting changes.

todos.title: Buy groceries
todos.description: Purchase all required household groceries including milk, eggs, bread, fruits, vegetables, cooking oil, snacks, and emergency supplies while checking expiration dates, comparing prices, and avoiding unnecessary impulse purchases.

todos.title: Prepare sprint report
todos.description: Compile a detailed sprint report summarizing completed tasks, partially finished work, pending backlog items, encountered blockers, velocity metrics, bug statistics, and overall team performance insights for stakeholder review.

todos.title: Team meeting
todos.description: Attend the weekly team sync meeting to discuss sprint progress, review upcoming priorities, align on technical decisions, clarify requirements, raise concerns, and document action items for follow-up.

todos.title: Fix login bug
todos.description: Investigate and resolve the login token refresh issue affecting session persistence, including debugging JWT expiry handling, refresh token rotation, race conditions during parallel requests, and regression testing across browsers.

todos.title: Update README
todos.description: Update the project README with clear setup instructions, environment variable definitions, local development steps, troubleshooting tips, deployment notes, and contribution guidelines for new developers.

todos.title: Refactor services
todos.description: Refactor frontend service layers to remove duplicated API logic, improve separation of concerns, standardize error handling, simplify method signatures, and ensure easier maintainability and scalability.

todos.title: Write unit tests
todos.description: Write comprehensive unit tests covering core business logic, edge cases, failure scenarios, mocked dependencies, and asynchronous flows with the goal of increasing overall test coverage to at least eighty percent.

todos.title: Push hotfix
todos.description: Deploy a critical hotfix to production after validating the patch in staging, running smoke tests, confirming rollback readiness, monitoring logs post-deployment, and notifying stakeholders about the fix.

todos.title: Optimize database queries
todos.description: Analyze slow database queries, add or adjust indexes, refactor joins, reduce unnecessary data fetching, and validate improvements using query execution plans and performance benchmarks.

todos.title: Code review
todos.description: Perform an in-depth code review of teammate changes, ensuring adherence to coding standards, architectural patterns, performance best practices, readability, test coverage, and long-term maintainability.

todos.title: Design discussion
todos.description: Participate in a detailed design discussion covering micro-frontend boundaries, shared dependencies, build pipelines, runtime integration, deployment strategy, and long-term scalability considerations.

todos.title: Clean workspace
todos.description: Organize physical desk and digital workspace by archiving old files, deleting unused assets, arranging folders logically, and ensuring a distraction-free working environment.

todos.title: Backup database
todos.description: Create a secure and verified backup of the production database, validate backup integrity, test restore procedures, and store copies in geographically redundant locations.
